alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 2:03PM CST until January 30 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills ranging from 25 below to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and central, north central and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...From 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
